text: Scout Taylor-Compton (born February 21, 1989) is an American actress. She has done many horror movies, dramas and small television roles, thereby earning the reputation of a scream queen. She played Lita Ford in The Runaways (2010). She also played Laurie Strode in Halloween (2007) and Halloween II (2009). Taylor-Compton was born in Long Beach, California. ==References== Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Long Beach, California Category:1989 births Category:Living people
title: Scout Taylor-Compton
